definitions.definition: Realization or understanding of the significance and nature of events after they have occurred .
examples: You know what they say, hindsight is twenty-twenty .
In hindsight , I realize that I should have studied harder for the exam.

definitions.definition: The rear sight of a firearm .

main_definition: Realization or understanding of the significance and nature of events after they have occurred .
secondary_definitions: ( rare ) The rear sight of a firearm .
